name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 010
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. In a cheap attempt to gain more twitter followers I decided to do a giveaway.  Please Stand By, While I do a giveaway for followers.
